attributes.action: Pay for the Cost of Living with (at least 50%) Windfall Tax
attributes.additional_details: That’s why we ask that at least 50% of the Cost of Living Plan be paid for by Windfall Tax, and only then, cover the rest through borrowing
attributes.background: The people of the UK shouldn’t have to pay for freezing energy bills this winter, by borrowing and adding to the national debt, when the energy companies are making £170bn+ in profits.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Increase the windfall tax on energy companies and apply it retroactively.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623277
